subject: How to blend meritocracy and DEI
body:
April 1st foolery; new EEOC guidance; the impact on veterans; Morgan Stanley DEI backfires  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
View in browser
 
 April 01, 2025
In a shocking reversal, the White House today announced that it is restarting DEI initiatives across all government agencies, restoring funding to all universities, and offering tax breaks to any corporation that shows tangible progress on DEI. 
April Fools'!
 … unfortunately 😭 
 
All jokes aside, we are excited to introduce the 
MIME
 framework, which aligns the calls for meritocracy with key DEI objectives—see below.
 
– Team Aleria 
DEI Backlash: 
Pros
 and 
Cons
Stories focused on the anti-DEI backlash, and efforts to put a stop to the nonsense!
 
Quantifying DEI
Exploring the tangible aspects of DEI and current efforts to quantify it
 
DEI Resources
Useful tools and information to support your DEI efforts
 
The Complexity of DEI
Unintended consequences and ripple effects of DEI
 
Golden Nuggets,
 Silver Linings
Unexpected bits of good news... when we can find them.
We almost never share links to podcasts, but this episode of 
The Future of Work
 is awesome: Jill Finlayson speaks with Bo Young Lee, who brings a wealth of experience to discuss some of the hottest topics about the DEI backlash. On the academic front, 
Harvard will offer free tuition
 to families making less than $200K/year—joining a few other elite schools in diversity push. And our unique work keeps attracting attention: check out the 
latest podcast
 and some quotes in 
CSO magazine
.
 
 
Aleria Happenings
The latest from the Aleria Team
 
Introducing 
MIME
: the Measurable approach to Meritocracy for 
ALL
 Employees
Organizations are searching for ways to comply with the administration's executive orders and the call to “restore meritocracy." But how do you create a truly merit-based system that benefits
 all
 employees? Aleria's 
Measuring Inclusion and Merit for Efficiency
 (
MIME
) 
framework provides the answer.
 
Anchored in the 
MIME
 framework, our 
Inclusive Leadership
 and 
Inclusive Management Training
 
programs give your teams the knowledge, data, tools, and best practices to foster a high-performing, stable workforce—without guesswork, backlash, or legal exposure. 
Our training is fully customizable, from half-day sessions to multi-day deep dives, both in-person and virtually. 
With 
MIME
, you don't just talk about meritocracy—you implement it effectively in a way that benefits 
all
 employees!
 
 
Visit our website
 for additional information, 
send us an email
 to learn more, or use the button below to schedule a call with Aleria's Founder and Chief Scientist, Paolo Gaudiano, who can provide 
more details and answer any questions about how 
Measuring Inclusion and Merit for Efficiency
 can give your organization a competitive advantage.
Book a call with Paolo
 
Mark Your Calendars
DEI-related events, applications and opportunities. Submit relevant events to 
info@aleria.tech
On April 3, 2025 at 12pm US/ET, join Charter and Understood for 
Neurodiversity and the Future of Business
, a discussion of the workplace designs, team dynamics, and leadership approaches to maximize the strengths of neurodivergent workers. The presentation includes case studies and resources that you can use in your own organization. 
Free registration
.
On April 3-9, 2025, join the 17th 
Annual ReelAbilities Film Festival: New York
. This amazing festival, which spans multiple venues and virtual showings, reframes disability and celebrates inclusion and accessibility through film. 
Get your tickets today
!
On April 9, 2025 at 12pm US/ET, join a Fairgodboss webinar on 
Allyship and Self-Advocacy for Career Growth
, featuring leaders from Cargill, who will discuss self-advocacy and allyship. Gain practical strategies to communicate effectively, boost confidence, challenge workplace biases, and foster an inclusive environment for career growth and support. 
Free registration
.
On April 10 at 11:00 am US/ET join our Chief Scientist Paolo Gaudiano for a FREE webinar on 
Rethinking DEI: Addressing Common Misconceptions. 
Paolo we'll dive into the misconceptions surrounding diversity and inclusion, address concerns about meritocracy, and explore practical ways to approach DEI while staying compliant with current policies. 
Free Registration
.
On April 21-24, 2025, The Winters Group will host 
The Power of Inclusion Summit
, a virtual conference designed to support the community during these challenging. There is a Pay What You Can option that lets you pay between $100 and $798 for the April 22-24 sessions. 
Learn more and register.
 
Spread the love!
If you enjoy the Aleria newsletter, forward it to a friend or colleague!
If you received this newsletter from a loving friend or colleague :-), use the button below to reach our newsletter subscription page.
SUBSCRIBE
101 Avenue of the Americas, FL 9
New York, NY 10013, USA

. If you wish to stop receiving all Aleria-related communications, please use the Unsubscribe link below.

body:

subject: 🌟 What is the Thirty Under 30 Program & Why Should You Be a Part of It?
body:
Submit your application before April 11!
View this email online
 
Hey Dustin,
 
Have you ever dreamed of joining an exclusive group of rising stars in the learning and development world? 
Thirty Under 30
 
is 
that
 group—an exceptional circle of innovators, trailblazers, and change-makers under 30, all recognized for their impactful contributions to the field. I
t’s
 happening right here at the
 
Learning Leadership Conference
 this October 1-3 in Orlando, FL.
What is the Thirty Under 30 Program?
It’s
 a prestigious recognition program that celebrates the brightest young leaders who are shaping the future of learning, training, and development. Being part of 
Thirty 
Under 30 means you are officially among the best in the industry, and we are here to support you every step of the way.
 
Start My Application
Applicants must have been born Oct. 4, 
1995,
 or later and be under age 30 at the Learning Leadership Conference.
Benefits of Participating in Thirty Under 30:
Networking
: Meet and connect with an exclusive group of like-minded, forward-thinking professionals.
 
Mentorship Opportunities
: Gain direct access to some of the top thought leaders and experts in the field.
 
Increased Visibility
: Receive recognition across the industry and be 
showcased
 at the Learning Leadership Conference—the perfect platform to elevate your profile.
 
Career Boost
: Your achievements will be celebrated, providing you with opportunities for new projects, collaborations, and career advancements.
 
Exclusive Resources
: Get access to tools, 
online 
events, and industry insights that are unavailable to the 
general public
.
 
If 
you're
 passionate about transforming the learning landscape and ready to be recognized for your achievements, this is the opportunity 
you've
 been waiting for.
.. OR do you know someone 
who
 is a rising star in your organization? Encourage them to apply!
 
Apply today
 to join the next generation of groundbreaking leaders in L&D!
 
Don’t
 wait, applications are only open until 
April 11 at 
11:59 P.M.
 local time.
 
Apply Now
Best, 
The Learning Leadership Conference Team
“
I absolutely loved the program and am so excited others get the chance to experience the same."
—
Leonie Yijink, MCI
Copyright © 2025 
CSM Learning, LLC

subject: - Why do I do what I do?
body:
Spoiler: It's corny. And authentic.‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­‌   ­
 
 
A little context about some big news...
Way, way back in high school when I got the “What do you want to be when you grow up?” question, I recall answering, “I don’t know yet but farther down the road I could see myself teaching.” All I really knew was that I wanted to make a difference in people’s lives. And a positive one at that.
 
I knew classroom teaching wasn’t my sweet spot, but I dabbled in it on three continents before I found my way to transformational training and facilitation for adults, and a few years later when I became MBTI and coaching certification Sparks of Change was born. I’ve long known I am not the one to lead the movement, but my role is to support and spark, if you will, others to be and do their best. And, in the past two years a new identity emerged as I became a trauma-informed coach and healer, developing myself into a somatic and spiritual leader.
As coach, facilitator, trainer, instructional designer and healer—my role is to help people get along just a little better. Corny factor acknowledged, this is my bit towards world peace. 
Psst:
­
Read the gory details of my journey summarized in pithy bullet points.
­
About Me
 
Last summer I started itching to figure out how to communicate the common thread to my roles and skills.  
Thus, with help from the amazing folks at 
Perspektiiv
, 
I am thrilled to launch the new Sparks of Change website!
­
Check it out now! 
 
­
I facilitate connection
 to yourself, to others and with Spirit.  
I take a holistic and inclusive approach to wellness, experiential learning and facilitation for individuals and groups interested in transformation and wellbeing. 
Promo code: CONNECTION
To celebrate and be of service to those who know me and those will be new,  I am gifting everyone a deep discount to come work with me. 
 
Use code CONNECTION for a 25% discount on any offering. Must be purchased by April 15, 2025 but you can schedule sessions for any time, they won't expire.
 
This is heart work, I offer a money back guarantee if you are not satisfied. 
 
Let's Connect Now
­
I would love to support and learn along with you, 
 
Joayne Nicole 
­
Sparks of Change
4509 Oakland Ave, 55407, Minneapolis

subject: Rethinking the Language of DEI
body:
Bridging Divides Without Compromising Values  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
View in browser
 
 March 18, 2025
DEI has become undoubtedly one of the most polarized topics in today's workplace. While some attribute the backlash to misinformation, what if the real issue is how we—DEI advocates—have framed and communicated these concepts? Our team has recently written about this challenge, not to assign blame but to foster understanding. How did we get here, and how can we do better? Whether you champion DEI initiatives or have doubts, we invite you to read, listen, and share your perspective.
 
 
– Team Aleria
DEI Backlash: 
Pros
 and 
Cons
Stories focused on the anti-DEI backlash, and efforts to put a stop to the nonsense!
 
Quantifying DEI
Exploring the tangible aspects of DEI and current efforts to quantify it
 
DEI Resources
Useful tools and information to support your DEI efforts
 
The Complexity of DEI
Unintended consequences and ripple effects of DEI
 
Golden Nuggets,
 Silver Linings
Unexpected bits of good news... when we can find them.
Congratulations to Louis Chesney, whose consulting work on the film 
Magnetospher
 has contributed to its selection as one of fourteen feature films to be screened at the 
ReelAbilities Film Festival New York
—the world's largest festival dedicated to showcasing films that celebrate the stories and talents of people with disabilities.
We're also pleased to see 
female influencers bridging the gap 
between traditional media in a male-dominated sport and a growing online fan base of women. And, of course, kudos to the 
nine companies leading the way
 with policies that break down barriers to workforce participation—and are seeing the results!
 
 
Aleria Happenings
The latest from the Aleria Team
Missed these conversations? Listen here:
🎙️
The Chris Voss Show Podcast
: 
“Measuring Inclusion: Higher profits and happier people, without guesswork or backlash”
🎙️
The State of Work Today Podcast
: 
"
The Real Business Case for Inclusion: Measuring What Matters"
🎙️
The Future Talent Council interview
: 
“Measuring What Matters: A New Approach to DEI"
 — a written version of the interview is 
also available, download it 
here
.
 
Embrace a new approach to DEI! Find out how focusing on inclusion leads to greater, sustainable diversity while driving superior performance for 
any
 organization, creating alignment instead of backlash. 
Visit our website
 for additional information, 
send us an email
 to learn more, or use the button below to schedule a call with Aleria's Founder and Chief Scientist, Paolo Gaudiano, who can provide more details and answer any questions about how measuring inclusion can give your organization a competitive advantage.
Book a call with Paolo
 
 
Mark Your Calendars
DEI-related events, applications and opportunities. Submit relevant events to 
info@aleria.tech
On March 27, 2025 at 11am US/ET, join this expert-led session, where leaders from KPMG, Legal & General Investment Management, and Lloyds will share proven strategies for creating workplaces that celebrate neurodiversity - driving innovation, boosting productivity, and cultivating a culture of belonging. 
Free registration
.
On April 3, 2025 at 12pm US/ET, join Charter and Understood for "Neurodiversity and the Future of Business," a discussion of the workplace designs, team dynamics, and leadership approaches to maximize the strengths of neurodivergent workers. The presentation includes case studies and resources that you can use in your own organization. 
Free registration
.
On April 3-9, 2025, join the 17th Annual ReelAbilities Film Festival: New York. This amazing festival, which spans multiple venues and virtual showings, reframes disability and celebrates inclusion and accessibility through film. 
Get your tickets today
!
On Thursday, April 10 at 11:00 am US/ET join our Chief Scientist Paolo Gaudiano for a FREE webinar on 
Rethinking DEI: Addressing Common Misconceptions. 
Paolo we'll dive into the misconceptions surrounding diversity and inclusion, address concerns about meritocracy, and explore practical ways to approach DEI while staying compliant with current policies. 
Free Registration
.
 
Spread the love!
If you enjoy the Aleria newsletter, forward it to a friend or colleague!
If you received this newsletter from a loving friend or colleague :-), use the button below to reach our newsletter subscription page.

. If you wish to stop receiving all Aleria-related communications, please use the Unsubscribe link below.

Our Full Service experts will handle your taxes for at least 10% less* than you paid a pro 
last year.
 
**********

Must lock in by

. 
Click for full details
.
 
Switch to our experts & save on Full Service
 
 
 
 
 
 
We're looking out for you
 
We’ll never ask for personal information in an email. When you click on a link, the address should always contain 
“intuit.com/”
. 
*Offer applies to the cost of TurboTax Full Service (“Full Service”) for 2024 personal taxes filed in calendar year 2025 and no other services. To be eligible to participate in the Beat the Price Program (“Program”), customer must: (i) Have used a Certified Public Accountant or other licensed tax preparer to prepare, sign and file their 2023 personal tax return (including through Full Service and TurboTax Verified Pros but excluding TurboTax Full Service Business); (2) Sign-up for or sign-into TurboTax Full Service and lock in their discount by March 18, 2025; and (3) File 2024 personal taxes with Full Service by March 25, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Program is available only to legal US residents. 
Price will be calculated at the time of 2024 tax return filing based on customer’s actual 2023 tax return prep fees minus 10%, or TurboTax’s current forms-based pricing, whichever is lowest, as determined by Sponsor in its sole discretion. The price difference will be adjusted at time of tax filing unless Sponsor requests proof of last year’s payment. 
To receive this offer, customer must provide an eligible receipt for 2023 personal taxes (“Eligible Receipt”) upon TurboTax’s request. The Eligible Receipt must be a valid receipt as determined by TurboTax in its sole discretion. If customer does not provide an Eligible Receipt, customer will not be entitled to any discount or an alternative Full Service offer. In such event, customer may be prohibited from using Full Service to file customer’s 2024 taxes and may be transferred to another TurboTax service, as determined by TurboTax in its sole discretion. 
Price includes 1 federal filing and applicable state filings via Full Service; other products or services are not included. Excludes TurboTax Full Service Business, TurboTax Verified Pro and TurboTax Canada services. Offer not available in combination with any other TurboTax offers and not valid for use with TurboTax self-preparation offerings. TurboTax reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time for any reason in its sole discretion.

subject: Across All Industries, The Learning Leadership Conference Is Right for You!
body:
Will we see you in Orlando this October?
View this email online.
Hello Dustin
,
 
Are you ready to take your leadership skills to the next level? Join us at the 
Learning Leadership Conference
, an event where leaders, innovators, and change-makers from diverse industries come together to explore the latest trends and strategies in leadership and learning.
REGISTER NOW
We have taken our conference game to the next level and are so excited to share with you what is happening
 at this year’s conference
.
 We have crafted 
numerous
 
opportunities to explore the latest tech at the L&D Solutions Gallery and BYOD sessions,
 plus you'll enjoy a new memorable networking experience (we're keeping the details a secret for a bit longer). 
You'll
 leave energized, empowered, and ready to drive meaningful organizational change.
Event Details:
📅 
Date
: 
October 1-3, 2025
📍
Location
: Rosen Centre Hotel | 
Orlando, FL
No matter your industry, the Learning Leadership Conference
 is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to lead effectively in today’s ever-evolving world. This is an opportunity to learn, grow, and connect with professionals who share your commitment to leadership excellence.
 
Register Now
 and secure your spot at the Learning Leadership Conference
 for the discounted Premier Rate of 
$1,295
—saving you $900
!
REGISTER NOW
We look forward to seeing you in October!
 
Best regards,
 
The Learning Leadership Conference Team

subject: Fw: Diligent - WO_DELMONTE_COC_080624 - Del Monte CoC
body:
Hi Dustin,
Please see below - final approval for Delmonte COC.
**Please note they stressed that all SCORM wrappers be completed. You had said it would take 2-3 days to complete, so 
can you reconfirm that you can get this all done by EOD Friday?
I had a call with Diligent today, and they have mentioned some slowdowns in delivery & also not all work updates being done. (I know we discussed this, so this isn't a complaint - just letting you know that they are not the happiest with us right now). So, I just want to make sure we deliver this 100% for them - without any mistakes.
Thank you!
From:
 Randi Mooney <rmooney@diligent.com>
Sent:
 Tuesday, March 11, 2025 11:53 AM
To:
 Nicole Barile <n.barile@lcwmail.com>
Cc:
 Jorgelina Venturi <j.venturi@lcwmail.com>; Don Reyes <dreyes@diligent.com>; Brian Luong <bluong@diligent.com>; Karen Lai <klai@diligent.com>; Kumud Mishra <kmishra@diligent.com>
Subject:
 Re: Diligent - WO_DELMONTE_COC_080624 - Del Monte CoC
 
 
Hi Nicole,
As discussed during our status call today, Del Monte has given us the green light to proceed with the final delivery. Translation previews and the v3 testable SCORM have been approved.
For the final delivery, Del Monte had requested in the work order to receive three wrapped SCORMs following the below layout:
Given the provided ETAs yesterday, could we expect the three final wrapped SCORMs to be ready by the end of the week?
Thanks!
_________________________
Diligent

Hello Randi,
Thank you for your patience.
There is now a v3 version in the folder on your server (see image). 
If the user selects "No, they have nothing to report" they get 100% score and a Complete trigger. If they select "Yes, they have something to report", they get 50% and a Completion trigger. If the user does not complete the course properly or move past the "Review" slide, they will retain an incomplete with no score.
<image.png>
Our team was trying to make this work with the least impact to all the other languages - to keep cost low for this customization added after translation....so it took a bit longer than expected.
Please let us know if you run into any issues.
Best,
Nicole

3. Adding a link to a Del Monte hosted survey (Survey Monkey or other tools) that allows the learner to to submit that text independent of the module. This option works best in my opinion if displayed on the last slide, so the learner can travel away from the module AFTER completeing it.

Hi Catalina,
 
Ok, if any availability pops up today, please let me know and I will make that time work. But in the meantime, sent over an invite for Friday.
 
Here is a summary of the situation:
Del Monte noted earlier this week that the SCORM 2004 test file worked well in their LMS but followed up asking if we could send them their test report.
We informed them that without explicit access to their LMS and metadata, it would not be possible to generate a report on their behalf.
They replied that their LMS does not allow for any reports to be exported. This is where the misunderstanding occurred.
Earlier in the project, it was interpreted that they were not getting the desired information from SCORM 1.2 completion reports. That is why we decided to proceed with SCORM 2004 as it allows for customized reportage.
We have asked Del Monte to confirm with their LMS, Convercent, what type of reports or metadata can be generated or exported. Awaiting a response here.
Questions to discuss:
Is there any way to run a report on behalf of Del Monte?
Have reporting capabilities been brought up in the prior year updates for Del Monte? If so, what was the recommendation?
Thanks!
_________________________
Diligent

subject: Exciting News: Learning 2025’s Thirty Under 30 Program is Now Accepting Applications!
body:
It's time to submit your application!
View this email online
 
Hey Dustin, 
We're thrilled about the upcoming 
Learning Leadership Conference
 
is n
ow officially a
ccepting applications
 through 
April 11
! This prestigious program recognizes and celebrates the
 
brightest
 young innovators
 in the 
learning and development industr
y
. 
If you are impacting L&D, we encourage you to apply!
 
Why Apply? 
Being part of the 
Thirty Under 30 cohort
 is an experience 
that brings unmatched opportunities for growth, recognition, and networking. Here are just a few of the many benefits of joining the program:
 
Apply For The Thirty Under 30 Cohort Today!
• Gain access to a network of like-minded peers, seasoned professionals, and industry leaders who can help propel your career and initiatives. Also, receive invites to special events at Learning 2025, where you can showcase your work and connect with some of the most influential voices in the industry. 
• Get recognized as a top innovator in the L&D community, elevating your personal and professional brand. 
• Open doors to new opportunities with exposure to influence organizations, decision-makers, and potential mentors. In addition, participate in tailored development experiences designed to help you grow as a leader. 
Submit an Application
This program is competitive and highly selective, with only 30 rising stars chosen each year. 
Applicants must have been born Oct. 4, 
1995,
 or later and be under age 30 at the Learning Leadership Conference.
 
If you fit the bill, now is the time to 
submit your application.
 Not eligible? Encourage an outstanding colleague to apply! Don't wait, applications close 
April 11
 at 11:59 PM.
Best, 
The Learning Leadership Conference Team
“
The Thirty Under 30 program was a great opportunity for me, and I know that those in my alumni class have been able to progress in their careers since being part of the program."
—
Sarah Truchard
Copyright © 2025 
CSM Learning, LLC
. All Rights Reserved. 
Privacy Policy
 
and 
Terms of Use Agreement
.
 
This email was sent to 
dustin@lcwmail.com
. If you would like to unsubscribe from our emails, 
click here to update your contact preferences
. You may also contact us at CSM Learning, LLC, 489 5th Ave, 5th Floor New York, NY 10017, United States, +1.707.566.8990 or email 
service@LearningGuild.com
.

subject: Find amazing talent with industry-leading casting tools
body:
Dustin ★ Find Cast & Crew for all of your productions - Get a 25% discount - Plus, casting advice and a platform overview ★
 
 
Post a Job for 25% off
  
with casting code: 
AMAZING73
 
 
Backstage reaches over 3 million actors, performers, 
and creative professionals worldwide. We are the 
most-
trusted casting resource, helping creators 
find 
the 
right talent
 for their projects for over 50 years.
Start the Casting Process 
With These Industry-Leading Tools:
 
Talent Database
Use advanced filters to find just the right talent worldwide. Or post a job for instantaneous distribution of your casting call.
 
Casting Dashboard
Easily keep track of your productions, notes, team collaborators, and talent applications.
 
Messaging
 Communicate with talent individually or in bulk. Messages are automatically organized by project.
 
Collaboration
Team collaboration tools allow you to share talent profiles with your clients and colleagues.
 
Audition Scheduling
Create your own audition schedule. Manually or automatically populate the schedule with candidates. Easily keep track of who's available to attend and who needs to reschedule.
 
Self-Taping
Send a self-tape audition request to your favorite applicants. The talent will then create a custom audio or video recording for your review.
 
Voiceover Platform
When you call for voiceover artists on Backstage, you get access to all of our usual great casting tools + access to specialized voiceover talent profiles and search tools based on a range of voiceover skills and voice characteristics.
 
Virtual Auditions
Cast talent online in real-time without the need for a physical location. Virtual auditions are fully integrated with the audition scheduling system. And you'll automatically get a video recording of your live video-conference audition.
 
Talent Invitations
Once you've posted a job, you'll begin receiving applications from Backstage's vast talent network. Additionally, you can proactively find more candidates in the Talent Database and easily invite them to apply.
 
Application Manager & Shortlists
Every project gets its own Application Manager, where you can quickly filter down to the best candidates and organize submissions into convenient workflow folders. Then place your favorites into Shortlists to easily share your selects.
Are you ready to get started?
 
Find Talent
Creator Advice
Post a Job
Thank you
 
VP of Casting
Backstage, 2300 Empire Avenue 5th Floor, Burbank, CA 91504, United States 
Unsubscribe
 
Manage preferences

subject: The #1 gift for Employee Appreciation Day 🥇

. 
*Offer applies to the cost of TurboTax Full Service (“Full Service”) for 2024 personal taxes filed in calendar year 2025 and no other services. To be eligible to participate in the Beat the Price Program (“Program”), customer must: (i) Have used a Certified Public Accountant or other licensed tax preparer to prepare, sign and file their 2023personal tax return (including through Full Service and TurboTax Verified Pros but excluding TurboTax Full Service Business); (2) Sign-up for or sign-into TurboTax Full Service and lock in their discount by March 18, 2025; and (3) File 2024 personal taxes with Full Service by March 25, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Program is available only to legal US residents. 
Price will be calculated at the time of 2024 tax return filing based on customer’s actual 2023 tax return prep fees minus 10%, or TurboTax’s current forms-based pricing, whichever is lowest, as determined by Sponsor in its sole discretion. The price difference will be adjusted at time of tax filing unless Sponsor requests proof of last year’s payment. 
To receive this offer, customer must provide an eligible receipt for 2023 personal taxes (“Eligible Receipt”) upon TurboTax’s request. The Eligible Receipt must be a valid receipt as determined by TurboTax in its sole discretion. If customer does not provide an Eligible Receipt, customer will not be entitled to any discount or an alternative Full Service offer. In such event, customer may be prohibited from using Full Service to file customer’s 2024 taxes and may be transferred to another TurboTax service, as determined by TurboTax in its sole discretion. 
Price includes 1 federal filing and applicable state filings via Full Service; other products or services are not included. Excludes TurboTax Full Service Business, TurboTax Verified Pro and TurboTax Canada services. Offer not available in combination with any other TurboTax offers and not valid for use with TurboTax self-preparation offerings. TurboTax reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time for any reason in its sole discretion.

subject: Microlearning SCORM issue
body:
Hello Patricia & Dustin,
I hope all is well with you! I'm emailing you regarding two of our SCORM packages: 
- Managing Unconscious Bias in Performance Reviews
- Managing Unconscious Bias in Hiring
We are failing to upload these SCORMs properly and are getting this error message: Failed - There is a file in each zip which appears to be too long
We believe this might be due to some assets within the SCORMs that have very long names such as GL_LDSP_MUBPRFCRW: languages/PortugueseB/scormcontent/assets/businessman-in-formal-clothes-is-with-black-man-ou-2023-11-27-05-03-29-utc.jpg
Would it be possible to shorten the lengths of the names of these assets (and ensure this doesn't "break" any of the functionality within the course) and reshare the SCORMs?
Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you!
-- 
Al Morali
he/him
Senior Instructional Designer
Colgate-Palmolive Company
909 River Road, Piscataway, NJ US 08855

subject: EL Pricing & New Build request
body:
Hi again 🙂.
Thank you again for your time and help working with me & LCW!
I took these notes from our call re: pricing for EL builds & added some of my own thoughts:
Tier 1
: $1,500-$2,000 for the first one - then after the first couple we can get it down in price (perhaps $800-$1,000). (this is assuming a series; example: LCW asks Dustin to do 5 Spotlights; after doing the first one, future ones would be quicker to build because we would have a template in place)
Tier 2
: $2,000-$5,000
Tier 3
: $5,000-$8,000 can cover 
most
 levels of complexity...branching, etc.
Tier 4:
 $8k+ - very time intensive builds 
Languages
: About 3 hours per lang  (roughly $200 per) - Could do tiers like we do with clients (Ex: Tier 1 - Spanish, French, etc. is $120; Tier 2 is $180; Tier 3 is $200)
We should create a 
description of each Tier
 so it is clear to everyone (LCW, Elixir, Client) what is involved.
Let me know your thoughts on the above.
And last but not least, 
we do have a request for a new EL build of about 25 min from Ryan Specialty
. They want to do something very similar to what they did last time:
https://360.articulate.com/review/content/6e619a48-1167-4861-a4ec-ac8fdb349092/review
This is more about Cultural Competence (with a global approach). If we get you a PPT deck of this new course, could you 
please LMK what the price would be to build 
(based on the last EL we did for Ryan)? And also about 
how long it takes to build v1?
Most likely I would build the PPT deck with Keri's help (so we get the right design elements), and then we would pass it to you.
Lmk if you have any questions or need more info.
THANK YOU, DUSTIN!
Nicole Barile
 
(She/Her)
Chief Operating Officer
LCW

subject: [Expensify] Travel and expense, at the speed of chat
body:
tl;dr - Introducing Expensify Travel: fully managed corporate travel via web, app, or chat – now available to every Expensify member
 
Travel and expense should go hand in hand… and now they can! We've long been asked by customers big and small for the ability to: 
Book flights, hotels, rail, and car rentals from inside the app.
Limit what inventory employees see to only what is in the authorized travel policy.
Pay for these bookings using a central virtual card.
Capture the travel receipts into an automatic expense report.
Cut travel costs
In 
New Expensify
, press the green + button 
> Book travel
 (or in 
Expensify Classic
, click the 
Travel
 button along the left side of the screen). It does all the things you expect (in-policy booking results, travel-based spend analysis, out-of-policy notices, approvals before booking, duty-of-care reporting), plus a few tricks you don't – courtesy of the realtime chat framework of the New Expensify superapp: 
Realtime duty of care
, which lets you know where all your employees are at all times. We even connect the traveler and travel manager in a dedicated chat room to discuss all bookings and changes the instant they happen, rather than whenever you get around to checking your inbox.
Realtime expense management,
 where every booking receipt and change fee is recorded as an expense that's submitted up through Expensify's realtime approval and next-day reimbursement engine: book today, get paid tomorrow!
Realtime collaboration
, where shared trip chat rooms are automatically created in New Expensify so that everyone is on the same page. From employees to managers, everything you need to know about your trip, all in one place. 
The instant, chat-first design of New Expensify is why we like to say that Expensify does:
Travel and expense at the speed of chat.
To check it out, open your Expensify app and click 
Travel
, or take a peek below!
It's one of the most exciting times to be at Expensify that I can ever remember. We have a 
lot
 going on, and it's energizing to be sharing it with you after so long in development. Keep an eye out for a ton more on the way!
-david
Founder and CEO of Expensify
Questions? Ask me in the 
#new-expensify-feedback
 room! 
PS: Check out OpenAI's work on building an 
artificial engineer
 to solve Expensify App open source projects!
Sent by: Expensify, Inc. - 548 Market St #61434 - San Francisco, CA 94103
To unsubscribe, please click 
here

subject: Simplify your casting process with these industry-leading tools
body:
Dustin ★ Unlock the power of Backstage for FREE. Casting you can trust, from the world's most popular casting service. ★
 
 
Simplify Your Casting Process 
With These Industry-Leading Tools:
:
 
Job Posting Network:
Easily distribute calls for cast and crew. Target exactly what type of talent you need and where you need them. Reach an audience of over 3 million aspiring performers and professionals.
 
Applicant Management System:
Talent submissions are automatically organized for you by project and role. Advanced tools allow you to quickly filter down results to the most relevant candidates; customize your workflow process; collaborate; and communicate.
 
Talent Search:
 
The Backstage Talent Database grants you access to a vast network of talent. Filter the results to find profiles that will fit even the most niche production needs, including actors, voiceover artists, dancers, singers, comedians, influencers, and more.
 
Remote Casting:
No matter where you are in the world, now you can 
cast talent online and in real-time
, with our live "virtual audition" video-conference tools and custom-recording "self-tape request" system.
Are you ready to get started?
 
Find Talent
Creator Advice
Post a Job
Thank you
 
VP of Casting
Backstage, 2300 Empire Avenue 5th Floor, Burbank, CA 91504, United States

Starting soon!
Respite & Resilience Gathering
Register Now
 
30 min session
 
Wednesday Feb 19, 4:30 pm central / 5:30 pm eastern
 
I will lead you through simple but powerful somatic tapping to ground and release current trauma including: 
* Two techniques for grounding and releasing the trauma of hypervigilance
* A daily practice to connect to your power and protect your energy
 
Your parasympathetic system will get a reset, you’ll have named and released much of what has accumulated in your body and we’ll share positive communal energy that you can take forward. 
 
Free to register
I’ll share a link for an optional sliding scale payment ($10 minimum) after we complete. 
Check out the final date
 
­ 
­ 
­ 
I hope you can join, 
 
Joayne Nicole
­
PS: My rebranded website is live! If you want to check it out, have a look here: 
www.sparksofchangetogether.com 
Sparks of Change
4509 Oakland Ave, 55407, Minneapolis

Join us for a simple session, an offering from my heart using some skills great people have taught me that I know will benefit you. 
 
Can you carve out 30 minutes to join? No need to be on camera, I won't make you interact with others, just want to offer you some support through the current challenges. 
Respite & Resilience Gatherings
30 min sessions
 
Wednesday Feb 19, 4:30 pm central / 5:30 pm eastern
Wednesday Feb 26, 8:30 am central / 9:30 am eastern
 
I will lead you through simple but powerful somatic tapping to ground and release current trauma including: 
* Two techniques for grounding and releasing the trauma of hypervigilance
* A daily practice to connect to your power and protect your energy
 
Your parasympathetic system will get a reset, you’ll have named and released much of what has accumulated in your body and we’ll share positive communal energy that you can take forward. 
 
Free to register
I’ll share a link for an optional sliding scale payment ($10 minimum) after we complete.

body:
Are you free 2/19 or 2/26? ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ 
 
 
 
Greetings, 
 
If you missed the prior Gatherings, there are still two more.
Respite & Resilience Gatherings
30 min sessions
 
Wednesday Feb 19, 4:30 pm central / 5:30 pm eastern
Wednesday Feb 26, 8:30 am central / 9:30 am eastern
 
I will lead you through simple but powerful somatic tapping to ground and release current trauma including: 
* Two techniques for grounding and releasing the trauma of hypervigilance
* A daily practice to connect to your power and protect your energy
 
Your parasympathetic system will get a reset, you’ll have named and released much of what has accumulated in your body and we’ll share positive communal energy that you can take forward. 
 
Free to register
I’ll share a link for an optional sliding scale payment ($10 minimum) after we complete. 
Register for Feb 19 Gathering
 
Register for Feb 26 Gathering
 
Share all dates with someone who would like to attend
 
­ 
­ 
­ 
I hope you can join, 
 
Joayne Nicole
­
PS: My rebranded website is live! If you want to check it out, have a look here: 
www.sparksofchangetogether.com 
Sparks of Change
4509 Oakland Ave, 55407, Minneapolis

subject: [Don't Miss Out] The Digital Learning Experience: Top 3 Trends for 2025
body:
Equip your workforce for the future—explore the latest trends and actionable strategies to redefine learning and development in 2025. 
Click here 
to view this message in a browser window 
 
The Digital Learning Experience: 
Top 3 Trends for 2025
 
 
 
Wednesday, February 26, 2025
 
 
11:00am ET; 8:00am PT
60 minutes
 
Online
Register Now
 
 
To build a future-ready workforce, learning and development must keep pace with the evolving demands. Rethinking traditional learning approaches and investing in the future of learning to equip your people with the skills of tomorrow is no longer optional—it is imperative for long-term success.
Join this complimentary webinar
 to hear from eLearning experts 
Alistair Lee
, 
Adobe Connect Product Evangelist
 at Adobe
; 
Scott Biegel
, 
Principal Solutions Consultan
t at Adobe
; and 
Umesh Kanade
, 
VP of Capability Development
 at Harbinger Group
. Together, they will explore the top three learning trends for 2025 and provide actionable insights on implementing these trends into your organization.
Specifically, attendees will:
Explore innovative methods to develop future-ready learning strategies and engage a multigenerational workforce
Discover scalable, tech-driven solutions for continuous learning and personalized, measurable experiences
Learn how to track L&D initiatives aligned with business goals
Understand how AI can assist in enhancing human intelligence rather than replacing jobs
Register Now
 
 
Margo Fahey

subject: Pricing questions
body:
Hi again Dustin,
I know you said you might be able to work with us on pricing if we gave you more lead time.
If this proposal is still possible, could you please answer the following?
How long does it take you, on average, to turn an existing LCW training (from PPT) into an elearning or microloearning (assuming under 30 hours in length)? I'm asking in terms of how many days/weeks is typical turnaround time AND also how many hours on average.
How long would it take you (again in terms of time overall in days/weeks & in hours), on average, to create a new microlearning from scratch (assuming the course is around 30 minutes or less & you had an SME to work with)?
Would you consider working on a project basis. For example, it would cost $X to turn any LCW Spotlight (roughly a 1-hr training) into a ML. Or, it would cost $X to create any ML from scratch (if under 30 min).
For #3 above, I realize you might need more parameters, but I just wanted to get a rough idea.
As you mentioned, someone else might be less expensive per hour, but you might be able to do it in half the time 🙂. Or, maybe negotiating a set rate for certain things might be a better option...
I'm just spitballing - trying to see how we can continue to work with you.
LMK what you think! Happy to hop on a call too to discuss.
Thanks!
Nicole Barile
 
(She/Her)
Chief Operating Officer
LCW

Your savings could be earning low interest in a traditional bank
 
We make more cents together
It's no secret: Traditional savings accounts typically earn low interest.

Save smarter

With up to $1.25 million of FDIC insurance,
3
 your money is in good hands.
You can view your investments and savings together
With the Cash Plus Account, you can combine your investments and savings in one place to see your complete financial picture.
You can move money and make payments
Enjoy flexibility and the ability to make money moves—literally. Connect the Cash Plus Account with payment apps like PayPal and Venmo to easily send and receive money.
4
It's a match!
Some things just belong together—like saving and earning more money.
2
Open an account
 
Connect with us
®
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1
The Vanguard Cash Plus sweep program APY (annual percentage yield) is 3.65% as of January 6, 2025. The average bank savings yield was 0.41% as of January 21, 2025 (Source: FDIC National Rates and Rate Caps). The Vanguard Cash Plus Account is a brokerage account offered by Vanguard Brokerage Services, a division of Vanguard Marketing Corporation, member FINRA. There may be other material differences between products that must be considered prior to investing. All investing is subject to risk.
2
The Cash Plus bank sweep program APY will vary and may change at any time.
3
Bank 
Sweep program balances are held at one or more Program Banks, earn a variable rate of interest, and are not securities covered by SIPC. They are not cash balances held by Vanguard Brokerage Services (VBS), a division of Vanguard Marketing Corporation (VMC); VMC is not a bank. Balances are eligible for FDIC insurance subject to applicable limits. Bank Sweep deposits are covered by FDIC insurance up to $250,000 per insurable category of ownership at each Program Bank when aggregated with all other deposits held by you at such bank and in the same insurable category. VBS will aggregate and allocate Bank Sweep deposits to Program Banks across Vanguard Cash Plus and Vanguard Cash Deposit with identically registered accounts to offer maximum FDIC coverage up to $1.25 million for individual and trust accounts and $2.5 million for joint accounts when at least 5 Program Banks are utilized. VBS will aggregate and allocate Bank Sweep deposits for trust accounts at the account level and not at the beneficiary level. FDIC coverage may be decreased based on Program Bank limits and whether you've opted out of any Program Banks and is subject to applicable FDIC coverage limits. 
You are solely responsible for monitoring the aggregate amount that you have on deposit at each Program Bank in connection with FDIC limits, including through other accounts at VBS.
 See the 
Vanguard Bank Sweep Products Terms of Use
 and list of 
participating Program Banks
 for more information. For more information about FDIC insurance coverage, please visit 
fdic.gov
.
4
Some third-party institutions may not accept the Cash Plus Account routing number for transactions. If you have any issues using the routing number on a third-party website, contact the provider.
The Vanguard Cash Plus Account is a brokerage account offered by Vanguard Brokerage Services, a division of Vanguard Marketing Corporation, member FINRA and SIPC. Under the Sweep Program, Eligible Balances swept to Program Banks are not securities: they are not covered by SIPC, but are eligible for FDIC insurance, subject to applicable limits. Money market funds held in the account are not guaranteed or insured by the FDIC, but are securities eligible for SIPC coverage. See the 
Vanguard Bank Sweep Products Terms of Use
 and 
Program Bank list
 for more information.
Savings accounts may have characteristics that differentiate them from bank sweep programs offered by Vanguard Cash Plus. For example, they may offer overdraft protection, ATM access (immediate access to your money), and other convenience features. Each company's products differ, so it's important to ask questions to understand account features.

body:

Respite & Resilience Gathering
Join us tomorrow
(or register for the other two!)
 
Register for Feb 14 Gathering
 
30 min sessions
 
Friday Feb 14, 11:30 am central / 12:30 pm eastern
Wednesday Feb 19, 4:30 pm central / 5:30 pm eastern
Wednesday Feb 26, 8:30 am central / 9:30 am eastern
 
I will lead you through simple but powerful somatic tapping to ground and release current trauma including: 
* Two techniques for grounding and releasing the trauma of hypervigilance
* A daily practice to connect to your power and protect your energy
 
Your parasympathetic system will get a reset, you’ll have named and released much of what has accumulated in your body and we’ll share positive communal energy that you can take forward. 
 
Free to register
I’ll share a link for an optional sliding scale payment ($10 minimum) after we complete. 
Register for other dates
 
­ 
­ 
­ 
I look forward to connecting, 
 
Joayne Nicole

subject: Unlock Your Leadership Potential at the Learning Leadership Conference
body:
Join us in Orlando October 1 - 3, 2025.
View this email online.
Hi Dustin,
Level up your le
adership at the

,

!

the

Sounds Great ... But Why Should You (and Your Team) Attend?

subject: Help make education dreams a reality with The Vanguard 529 Plan
body:
Every step counts toward their future
 
Contributing in the new year can lead to big education savings
Help set your loved ones' dreams in motion—take small steps to save for their education.
Explore education accounts
A 529 is a powerful education savings tool that can help pave the way for your loved one's future.
Here's how the difference in accumulated savings might look when saving in a taxable account versus a 529 account.
1
Note: This hypothetical example of a long-term average return does not represent the return on any particular investment, and the 6% rate is not guaranteed.
Whether you're a parent, grandparent, aunt, or uncle, investing in a 529 plan can be a great way to support the children in your life.
Benefits include:
Tax advantages
Federal tax benefits include tax-deferred growth and tax-free withdrawals for qualified education expenses.
2
 You can also take advantage of state tax deductions on your contributions depending on where you live.
3
Flexibility
Whether it's for K–12 tuition and fees,
4
 college, trade school, or apprenticeships, you can save for whatever education your loved ones choose to pursue. If they don't use the funds, you can transfer the money to a family member or roll over up to $35,000 to a Roth IRA in their name.
5
Preparedness
Inflation and rising education costs may make it more difficult to pay for education expenses. Investing in a 529 plan can help your loved ones fund the future of their dreams.
We've made saving for education easier
You can now open a Vanguard 529 Plan account with $1,000. Nevada residents may open an account with a $500 minimum initial contribution.
Discover The Vanguard 529 Plan
1
This hypothetical example of a long-term average return does not represent the return on any particular investment, and the 6% rate is not guaranteed. It's an illustrative example of a long-term average return on a balanced investment of stocks and bonds.
 
The account comparison assumes 4% annual capital returns and 2% annual income returns. The after-tax return assumes a complete liquidation of the account, including applicable taxes. Calculations assume 22% federal income tax and 5% state income tax, along with a combined 20% capital gains tax rate. Source: Vanguard. Note that 529 accounts will be limited to the investments offered by the plan sponsor but generally offer well-diversified index investments. Market returns are not constant and will fluctuate annually. Lower tax rates on dividends and capital gains may make the taxable investment more favorable and the difference between taxable and tax-deferred ending balances less.
 
Any future changes in the tax treatment of investment earnings or a rate of return that is lower than the assumed rate of return may further impact the comparison. Investors should consider their time horizon and current and expected future tax rates before making an investment decision. The 529 ending balance calculation assumes proceeds are used for qualified expenses as defined by the Internal Revenue Code and discussed in the plan's Official Statement. If this were not the case, the ending balance, and the difference between account balances, could be lower due to applicable penalties and taxes.
2
Earnings on nonqualified withdrawals may be subject to federal income tax and a 10% federal penalty tax, as well as state and local income taxes. The availability of tax or other benefits may be contingent on meeting other requirements. State tax treatment of withdrawals used for i) expenses for tuition in connection with enrollment or attendance at an elementary or secondary public, private, or religious school, ii) expenses related to apprenticeship programs, or iii) student loan repayments is determined by the state(s) where the taxpayer files state income tax. If you are not a Nevada taxpayer, please consult with a tax advisor.
3
The availability of tax or other benefits may be contingent on meeting other requirements.
4
State tax treatment of withdrawals for K–12 tuition expenses, apprenticeship program expenses, and student loan repayments is determined by the state(s) where the taxpayer files state income tax. Please consult with a tax advisor for further guidance.
5
Certain restrictions apply, including to whom the assets may be transferred, a required holding period of 15 years, and limits on rollovers of contributions made within the 5 years prior to the rollover. The annual rollover limit is subject to Roth IRA annual contribution limits with a lifetime limit of $35,000 for each 529 account beneficiary. Consult your tax advisor prior to initiating a rollover. This is a provision of SECURE 2.0, passed in December 2022 as a follow-up to the Setting Every Community Up for Retirement Enhancement (SECURE) Act of 2019.
All investing is subject to risk, including the possible loss of the money you invest.
For more information about The Vanguard 529 College Savings Plan, visit vangu‍ard‍.‍com to obtain a Program Description, which includes investment objectives, risks, charges, expenses, and other information; read and consider it carefully before investing. Vanguard Marketing Corporation, Distributor.
If you are not a Nevada taxpayer, consider before investing whether your or the designated beneficiary's home state offers any state tax or other benefits that are only available for investments in such state's qualified tuition program. Other state benefits may include financial aid, scholarship funds, and protection from creditors.
The Vanguard 529 College Savings Plan is a Nevada Trust administered by the office of the Nevada State Treasurer.
The Vanguard Group, Inc., serves as the Investment Manager for The Vanguard 529 College Savings Plan and through its affiliate, Vanguard Marketing Corporation, markets and distributes the Plan. Ascensus Broker Dealer Services, LLC, serves as Program Manager and has overall responsibility for the day-to-day operations. The Plan's portfolios, although they invest in Vanguard mutual funds, are not mutual funds. Investment returns are not guaranteed, and you could lose money by investing in the Plan.

subject: Improve your casting process with team-collaboration tools
body:
Dustin 📍 Collaborate on casting your project with team mates, clients, and colleagues. Share shortlists & project access.
 
 
Collaborate on projects 
with your 
team
 and 
share 
valuable 
casting insights
 
Easy Collaboration
Your 
Casting Dashboard
 provides an overview of all of the projects you own, as well as the projects you've been invited to collaborate on, and a list of your collaborators.
Learn More
 
Manage Your Team
Your 
collaboration-management page
 provides more detailed information & controls. And from here you can also invite more Full Collaborators, giving them complete access to your project's Application Manager so they can help you organize and respond to talent.
Learn More
 
Share Shortlists
Creators can also add their favorite candidates to Short Lists, which can then be shared with additional colleagues and clients without having to grant them full project-level access. 
Learn More
 
Get Feedback
Full Collaborators and limited-access Shortlist Collaborators can view all of the profiles, videos, audio samples, and auditions associated with the talent you've granted them access to. And everyone can leave feedback notes for your review.
Learn More
 
Work Together 
on Auditions
Your Full Collaborators can view your audition schedules and join in on live Virtual Audition video sessions. Your team can also privately chat in real-time during the auditions. While your Shortlist Collaborators will be able to view audition recordings afterwards, if you choose to share selected applicants in a shortlist with them.
Learn More
CLICK TO GET STARTED
 
Post a Job
Find Talent
Cast Your Project

VP of Casting

body:
Free to register, join me this Friday. ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ 
 
 
Hi.
 
If you opened this, then give yourself the gift to breathe deeply just for a moment. 
 
Inhale to the count of 4, hold for a second and then exhale to the count of 7. 
 
Repeat. 
      And repeat again until you feel that release. 
                       (This morning it took about a dozen breaths until my shoulders let go.)
 
Like many of you, I’m working really hard to find my center each day right now. 
 
I’ll be honest, I spent the weekend and Monday morning in agitation, despair and my anger and discombobulation came out all over my most cherished beings. 
 
By Monday noon, I decided: No way am I going to let them make me feel this way or live this way. 
 
I prioritized the gym, breath work and pulled my energy to a higher level. I’m also recommitting to my gratitude journal. 
 
And by Tuesday as I came back into myself, I realized two things: 
I feel stronger and more resilient when I am service to others.
I’ve acquired some skills that can really be of great balm and support right now. 
 
S
o, here are two impromptu offers:
 
Respite & Resilience Gathering
This Friday February 7 at 12pm EST/ 11am Central
 
I will lead you through simple but powerful somatic tapping to ground and release current trauma including: 
* Two techniques for grounding and releasing the trauma of hypervigilance
* A daily practice to connect to your power and protect your energy
 
Your parasympathetic system will get a reset, you’ll have named and released much of what has accumulated in your body and we’ll share positive communal energy that you can take forward. 
 
Free to register
I’ll share a link for an optional sliding scale payment ($10 minimum) after we complete. 
Register for Gathering Now
 
Respite & Resilience Individual Sessions
One-on-one session to heal and access your best self
 
In the past two years, I’ve taken a lot of professional development courses and my coaching now integrates somatic techniques, accessing the Divine for wisdom and healing and practical techniques to release and heal current and prior trauma. In this session, we’ll open your Akashic Records to bring in wisdom and healing energies. Then we will start wherever you are and take a holistic approach to create balm and strength for you to continue, or to find, your next steps.
 
 
Invest in your self now, I'd love to be of service to you. 
 
$150 Investment
 
Sliding Scale
 
Noticing and caring for yourself is foundational if you want to be effective in your relationships, work, advocacy for change and purpose in this world. 
 
I know you know that, but let’s just say it again out loud for our heart and mind to hear: 
What’s in my control is caring for my body and my being. 
 
What does your being need? 
How can you prioritize that right now? 
 
It can be hard to do it alone, let's do it together. 
 
With peace and hope, and lots of breathing,
 
Joayne Nicole 
Register for Gathering Now
 
Sparks of Change
4509 Oakland Ave, 55407, Minneapolis

subject: Keep calm and carry on
body:
Beyoncé's Grammy; Trump's shock-and-awe; where 'woke' went wrong; and a book review.  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
View in browser
 
 February 04, 2025
As the world of DEI seems to be on fire, it is difficult to imagine that this, too, shall pass. We will see a lot of turmoil as DEI practitioners scramble to change wording or to come up with new frameworks. But the need to have productive, satisfied employees is so crucial to the success of any organization that leaders will eventually learn to reject the misleading claims made about DEI. For now the best we can do is to try to understand what aspects of DEI could have been done better, and use it to improve what we do and how we talk about it.
 
– Team Aleria
DEI Backlash: 
Pros
 and 
Cons
Stories focused on the anti-DEI backlash, and efforts to put a stop to the nonsense!
 
Quantifying DEI
Exploring the tangible aspects of DEI and current efforts to quantify it
 
DEI Resources
Useful tools and information to support your DEI efforts
 
The Complexity of DEI
Unintended consequences and ripple effects of DEI
 
Golden Nuggets,
 Silver Linings
Unexpected bits of good news... when we can find them!
Congratulations to Beyoncé for 
winning her first Grammy award for best album
, and being the first Black woman since 1999 to do so. She also won the Grammy for best country album, five months after being snubbed at the Country Music Awards. And kudos to the 
13 state attorneys general
 who issued a joint statement condemning former President Trump for spreading misinformation about the 2020 election.
 
 
Aleria Team Updates
The latest from the Aleria Team
 
Ready to start your 
Journey to Inclusion
?
Embrace a new approach to DEI! Find out how focusing on inclusion leads to greater, sustainable diversity while driving superior performance for 
any
 organization, creating alignment instead of backlash. Our four-stage 
Journey to Inclusion
 is ideally suited for organizations with 500 or more employees, regardless of your current level of DEI readiness. 
Visit our website
 for additional information, 
send us an email
 to learn more, or use the button below to schedule a call with Aleria's Founder and Chief Scientist, Paolo Gaudiano, who can provide more details and answer any questions about how measuring inclusion can give your organization a competitive advantage.
Book a call with Paolo
 
 
Mark Your Calendars
DEI-related events, applications and opportunities. Submit relevant events to 
info@aleria.tech
Tomorrow, February 5 at 12pm US/ET join InclusionScore for a Q&A about operational and tactical questions on inclusion from the people writing the global standards and advising actual companies and governments. 
Free registration.
On February 12, 2025 at 12-1pm US/ET join Aleria's Chief Scientist, Paolo Gaudiano for 
DEI IN 2025: A Sustainable Approach
. This webinar shows how organizations can navigate the backlash and transform challenges into opportunities. Discover how to continue supporting all employees while achieving superior financial performance, paving the way for meaningful and lasting impact. 
Free registration
.

subject: Announcing our largest-ever reduction in expense ratios
body:
Bringing our mission to life by delivering value for you
Since our founding nearly 50 years ago, Vanguard has been driven by a relentless focus on helping to give investors the best chance for success. Clients like you that invest directly with Vanguard through Personal Investor get to see this firsthand every day, through our mission-driven employees, a digital experience built to help make all clients better investors, and exceptional investment and savings products.
We're excited to share some big news with you: Vanguard is lowering the expense ratios across 87 of our funds, delivering an expected $350 million in savings for investors this year.
1
 
It's the largest expense ratio reduction in our 50-year history.
What does this mean for you? Lower expense ratios leave more money in your funds and raise their potential returns. And even small differences in expense ratios can have a big impact over the long term.
Read more
We believe investors shouldn't have to choose between low cost and strong performance. In fact, across the industry, lower-cost funds have historically outperformed higher-cost funds on a net-of-expenses basis.
2
This is how Vanguard brings our mission to life: An unwavering commitment to delivering value for you. Since 1975, we've reduced our funds' expense ratios more than 2,000 times.
We have a proud history of taking a stand for investors, and we'll continue to do that for you.
Thanks for being part of the Vanguard community.
Matt Benchener
Managing Director, Head of Vanguard Personal Investor
 
Connect with us
®
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1
Savings due to the reduction in expense ratios were calculated on a share class basis for each fund for which there is a Vanguard-initiated reduction. AUM as of November 30, 2024, for each relevant share class was multiplied by 2024 expense ratios. The same AUM data was then multiplied by 2025 reduced expense ratios. The difference was added across funds to determine the total estimated savings to Vanguard investors holding those funds in both 2024 and 2025.
2
See, for example, Principles for Investing Success, Vanguard, 2023.
All investing is subject to risk, including the possible loss of the money you invest.
For more information about Vanguard funds and ETFs, visit vanguard‍.‍com to obtain a prospectus or, if available, a summary prospectus. Investment objectives, risks, charges, expenses, and other important information are contained in the prospectus; read and consider it carefully before investing.
Vanguard is reducing expense ratios for certain share classes of some funds. There is no guarantee that any individual investor will save money due to the reductions in fund expense ratios. Not all fund share classes will have a reduced expense ratio and therefore not all investors will experience the estimated savings. Investors that purchase the relevant funds after the expense ratios have been reduced will not experience savings. Savings means future money not spent on expense ratios, and does not entail a rebate or deposit of any sort. Savings figures are estimates and should not be relied upon. Savings is based on data as of November 30, 2024; if other data is used, savings may differ. Estimated savings accrue to existing investors holding relevant share classes for 2024 and 2025. For illustrative purposes only. Past performance is not indicative of future results.

subject: Register Now: The Digital Learning Experience: Top 3 Trends for 2025
body:
Equip your workforce for the future—explore the latest trends and actionable strategies to redefine learning and development in 2025. 
Click here 
to view this message in a browser window 
 
The Digital Learning Experience: 
Top 3 Trends for 2025
 
 
 
Wednesday, February 26, 2025
 
 
11:00am ET; 8:00am PT
60 minutes
 
Online
Register Now
 
 
By augmenting human capabilities, the human-AI collaboration could generate up to $15.7 trillion in economic value by 2030, redefining the future of work in significant ways. This transformation also brings new challenges, and adding to the complexity is a multigenerational workforce with diverse learning needs and expectations.
To build a future-ready workforce, learning and development must keep pace with the evolving demands. Rethinking traditional learning approaches and investing in the future of learning to equip your people with the skills of tomorrow is no longer optional—it is imperative for long-term success.
Join this complimentary webinar
 to hear from eLearning experts 
Alistair Lee
, 
Adobe Connect Product Evangelist
 at Adobe
; 
Scott Biegel
, 
Principal Solutions Consultan
t at Adobe
; and 
Umesh Kanade
, 
VP of Capability Development
 at Harbinger Group
. Together, they will explore the top three learning trends for 2025 and provide actionable insights on implementing these trends into your organization.
Specifically, attendees will:
Explore innovative methods to develop future-ready learning strategies and engage a multigenerational workforce
Discover scalable, tech-driven solutions for continuous learning and personalized, measurable experiences
Learn how to track L&D initiatives aligned with business goals
Understand how AI can assist in enhancing human intelligence rather than replacing jobs
Kickstart 2025 with expert insights and strategies to elevate your learning and development initiatives.
Register Now
 
 
Margo Fahey

submit

Claim your refund today!
The IRS is now accepting returns. File now and put money in your pocket as soon 
as today.
 
**********
Get your max refund
The IRS reported an impact to certain filers' refunds till March 3rd. 
Learn more >
 
Get your refund faster, 
guaranteed
¹
Get your refund 5 days before 
IRS delivery in your chosen 
bank account.²
 
5 days before IRS delivery to your bank account for a fee. Terms apply.
Get fast money
 
Track your refund
Once you file, we’ll tell you when to expect your refund and alert you when it lands in your 
bank account.
 
Start filing now
 
 
 
We're looking out for you
 
We’ll never ask for personal information in an email. When you click on a link, the address should always contain 
“intuit.com/”
. 
*Average Refund Amount: Sum of $3,207 is the average refund American taxpayers received based upon IRS data date ending 2/16/24 and may not reflect actual refund amount received. 
You may be able to receive your federal refund early through your bank, credit union or other financial institution. Terms, fees, and delivery dates may vary. Check with your financial institution for details. 
Money movement services are provided by Intuit Payments Inc., licensed as a Money Transmitter by the New York State Department of Financial Services. For more information about Intuit Payments' money transmission licenses, please visit 
https://www.intuit.com/legal/licenses/payment-licenses/
. 
1 If your federal refund is deposited into your selected bank account less than 5 days before the IRS refund settlement date (the date it would have arrived if sent from the IRS directly), then you will not pay the 5 Days Early fee. See 
Terms of Service
 for more details. 
2 5 Days Early to Your Bank Account: Personal taxes only. Your federal tax refund will be deposited to your selected bank account 5 days before the refund settlement date provided by the IRS (the date your refund would have arrived if sent from the IRS directly). The receipt of your refund 5 Days Early is subject to IRS submitting refund information to us at least 5 days before the refund settlement date. IRS does not always provide refund settlement information 5 days early. You will not be eligible to receive your refund 5 Days Early if (1) you take a Refund Advance loan, (2) IRS delays payment of your refund, or (3) your bank’s policies do not allow for same-day payment processing. 5 Days Early fee will be deducted directly from your refund prior to being deposited to your bank account. If your refund cannot be delivered 5 Days Early, you will not be charged the 5 Days Early fee. 5 Days Early program may change or be discontinued at any time.

subject: Don’t Miss Out – Submit Your Proposal for the Learning Leadership Conference by Friday!
body:
We want to hear your ideas. Submit today!
View this email online.
Dear Dustin, 
We know 
you've
 got valuable insights to share, and 
we'd
 love to hear them at the 
Learning Leadership Conference!
 Now's your chance to inspire new audiences, shape the next generation of learning leaders, and connect with the industry's top innovators. Take a look at the top 3 reasons to apply: 
1. Boost Your Professional Profile and Network with Top Industry Changemakers
 
This event is a gathering of the best minds in learning and development.
 As a speaker, 
you'll
 have access to interact with fellow thought leaders, potential collaborators, and decision-makers. The relationships you cultivate here can open doors to new opportunities, projects, and partnerships.
 
2. Contribute to the Next Generation of Learning Leaders
 
The Learning Leadership Conference is an opportunity for you to shape the next generation of learning leaders. By presenting, 
you're
 not just sharing your experiences—
you're
 helping to drive the evolution of learning practices, tools, and strategies. Your session could inspire others to implement new methods, transform programs, and enhance the learning environment.
 
3. Make a Meaningful Impact
 
Your insights and experiences have the potential to make a profound impact. At the Learning Leadership Conference, 
you'll
 inspire and educate attendees, empowering them to take actionable steps toward innovation and improvement in their organizations and communities.
 
Don't Just Take Our Word For It...
“I wanted to thank you for organizing such a fantastic conference. It was an enriching experience.” -
Heli O.
, 
Artemisod
 
   
“It was a great experience as both a presenter and an attendee, and I brought so many ideas back to implement in the coming weeks.” -
Barbara L.
, SNHU
 
How to Submit Your Proposal:
 
Ready to get started? 
We've
 compiled 
frequently asked questions
 and top proposal examples to support you. 
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out to us at 
Programs@LearningGuild.com
.
 
Don't
 wait! The deadline to 
submit
 your proposal is this 
Friday, January 31, at 11:59 PM.
 
SUBMIT YOUR PROPOSAL
Note: Vendors are not eligible to 
submit
 a proposal for The Learning Leadership Conference.
 
Best,
The Learning Leadership Conference Team
Copyright © 2025 
The Learning Guild
. All Rights Reserved. 
Privacy Policy
 and 
Terms of Use Agreement
.

dustin@lcwmail.com
. If you would like to unsubscribe from Learning Guild emails, 
click here to update your contact preferences
. You may also contact us at The Learning Guild, 266 West 489 5th Ave, 5th Floor, New York, NY, 10017, United States or +1.707.566.8990 or email 
service@LearningGuild.com
.

subject: Are you making the most of the cash in your portfolio?
body:
Learn how to make your cash savings work harder
 
Get the most out of your savings in 2025. Financial professionals Nicole Townsend, CFA, and Ariel Finegold, CFA, explore the ins and outs of cash investments to help you maximize your savings over time.
"Do I have enough money in my emergency fund?"
If you've ever asked yourself this important question, you're not alone. See what our Vanguard experts have to say about how much you should save for emergencies—and how to make sure your rainy day fund is earning as much interest as possible.
Read it now
Get more from the cash in your portfolio
What role does cash play in a healthy portfolio—and how can you make the most of its earning potential? Get answers to these questions and more as our financial professionals dive into all things cash in our latest article.
Check it out

subject: Looking for talent? Discover the world's most-trusted casting network
body:
Dustin, post a FREE listing with the entertainment industry's #1 talent resource. Find cast, crew, influencers, and more
 
 
Trusted by the best
Founded in 1960, Backstage has a storied history of serving the entertainment industry. For over 50 years Backstage has served as 
t
he #1 casting and news resource
 for actors, models, performers, directors, producers, and casting directors.
 
Whether you're hiring locally or globally, Backstage's unparalleled talent network, 
cutting-edge tools
, 
and in-house casting specialists are sure to help you find exactly the talent you need wherever you are, for productions of every type and size
.
 
More than 50,000 productions are cast every year 
on Backstage. Here are a few of our favorite quotes from successful projects:
 
 
"Our video was about celebrating diversity, and we would have never been able to get the wide range of diverse and talented actors had we not used Backstage. Everyone who came on set was a professional, kind, and brought our video to the next level."
Aubrey Zych, Video Editor
 
"Backstage.com is my go-to place when it comes to finding the right talent for my projects."
Jesse Rosales, Casting Director
 
 
"Thanks very much – we really appreciate it. We love your platform and will likely be using it quite a bit going forward." 
Steve Wiesner, CEO of PelotonRPM
 
Let's Get Started
